title: Soup and a Sandwish
description: Soup and a Sandwish is an entertaining story about a boy who is tired of eating the same kind of lunch every day. He decides that if he can't get the sandwich he really wants, he will create it himself. The only problem is that he creates a bit more than he can handle. The text is supported by imaginative illustrations.
meta: ate, gigantic, glob, jiggly, monster, pile
Use the reading strategy of making logical predictions based on text information
Final Sound : Discriminate final /ch/ sound in words
Consonant Digraphs : Recognize and read final consonant digraph ch words
Punctuation : Identify and discuss use of the hyphen and dash
Content Vocabulary : Identify and use content vocabulary

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
